ui

Class GLCamManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.GLCamManager

  • public class GLCamManager
extends Object
    Handle all camera motion including smooth motions, click-to-coordinate mapping, etc. Update should be called in every graphics draw.
    Author:
    Matt

      • smoothRotateLong

        public void smoothRotateLong(float magnitude,
                             int speed)
        Orbit camera longitudinally by a magnitude in radians with a speed factor of 'speed.' The speed means how many update calls does it take to achieve the change.

      • smoothRotateLat

        public void smoothRotateLat(float magnitude,
                            int speed)
        Orbit camera latitudinally by a magnitude in radians with a speed factor of 'speed'. The speed means how many update calls does it take to achieve the change.

      • smoothTranslateAbsolute

        public void smoothTranslateAbsolute(javax.vecmath.Vector3f campos,
                                    javax.vecmath.Vector3f tarpos,
                                    int speed)
        Move camera eye and target positions to absolute positions given. This will be done in speed number of update calls.

      • smoothTranslateRelative

        public void smoothTranslateRelative(javax.vecmath.Vector3f campos,
                                    javax.vecmath.Vector3f tarpos,
                                    int speed)
        Move camera eye and target by offset amounts given. This will be done in speed number of update calls.

      • rotateLatitude

        public void rotateLatitude(float magnitude)
        User interaction to rotate the camera latitudinally. Magnitude of rotation is in radians and may be negative.

      • rotateLongitude

        public void rotateLongitude(float magnitude)
        User interaction to rotate the camera longitudinally. Magnitude of rotation is in radians and may be negative.
